originalText.text: I came here with my brother and I must say that the atmosphere is wonderful. Very relaxing and the service is amazing. Really took care of my hands and feet, felt important if you know what I mean. I am definitely going back for the massage and grooming! New spot for my self-care needs!

text.text: I came here with my brother and I must say that the atmosphere is wonderful. Very relaxing and the service is amazing. Really took care of my hands and feet, felt important if you know what I mean. I am definitely going back for the massage and grooming! New spot for my self-care needs!

originalText.text:
David did a great job on my head washing massage. I texted same day, got an answer almost immediately and came into the studio about 30 minutes later.
They had a restroom which was really clean, plus the treatment area was spotless as well.
They offered a lot of different beverages, and even offered some extra to take togo with me after my service. I couldn’t recommend this place enough. I will definitely come back to see David next time I am in nyc.

text.text:
David did a great job on my head washing massage. I texted same day, got an answer almost immediately and came into the studio about 30 minutes later.
They had a restroom which was really clean, plus the treatment area was spotless as well.
They offered a lot of different beverages, and even offered some extra to take togo with me after my service. I couldn’t recommend this place enough. I will definitely come back to see David next time I am in nyc.

originalText.text:
TERRIBLE uncomfortable experience and LOW QUALITY with hostile owners

-the man giving service was extremely under qualified and left the room for 15 minutes. when he came back his hands and body smelled like smoke that were then all over my body and face
-sprayed water in eyes in aggressive manner and on face multiple times while towel was covering mouth (couldn’t breathe)
-was extremely rough and not cautious of any sensitivity in scalp or on face - clearly not experienced
-took off my make up and was so rough over my eyes that he knocked out my contact
-face mask was irritating
-used garnier hair mask + shampoo/conditioner is Nexxus brand - nothing special
- at point he was massaging my neck and I couldn’t breathe because of the pressure

When telling them about my experience at the end man responded -  “you’re not going to tip me?”

Spoke with owners days later to give feedback and they are not doing anything to resolve and raised voice at me and told me I should have stopped the service. How? My head was was drenched in product - how do you stop that mid service?

Regret not checking previous reviews as my experience was similar to review below.

originalText.text: Terrible service and a hostile attitude to the customers. I got my waxing done in this place. At first everything seemed normal, although inside it is far from the order and cleanness that you expect in such institutions.  I was served by a male technician who didn’t  seem to have enough experience - the procedure took enormous 2.5 hours - at least twice as long as my waxing usually takes. The technician was chugging and taking breaks. I was late everywhere. Although it was sugaring, it was terribly painful, probably due to the inexperience of the technician. On top of that, at the check out, they refused to give me the discount published on their website referring to fine print. They would raise their voices at me, and they would ask me to show my phone, to prove that I called them, and I felt terrible like I was guilty and being interrogated. Finally, it cost me more than I would have spent at a more reputable spa with better service and well trained staff. I don’t recommend this place.

text.text: Terrible service and a hostile attitude to the customers. I got my waxing done in this place. At first everything seemed normal, although inside it is far from the order and cleanness that you expect in such institutions.  I was served by a male technician who didn’t  seem to have enough experience - the procedure took enormous 2.5 hours - at least twice as long as my waxing usually takes. The technician was chugging and taking breaks. I was late everywhere. Although it was sugaring, it was terribly painful, probably due to the inexperience of the technician. On top of that, at the check out, they refused to give me the discount published on their website referring to fine print. They would raise their voices at me, and they would ask me to show my phone, to prove that I called them, and I felt terrible like I was guilty and being interrogated. Finally, it cost me more than I would have spent at a more reputable spa with better service and well trained staff. I don’t recommend this place.

originalText.text: The service here is very good! They are very attentive, take good care of you and try to make you feel comfortable! Definitely had a good experience and will be coming back
